ygData.subject: Re: 256k Magix + EverQuest = Low Lag ??? Please comment!
ygData.msgSnippet: SCV/Singtel .. from what I see,dial up users have no problem with PL but have abit of lag problem here and there[starhub users] BTw on to a EQ question: Can a
ygData.messageBody:
SCV/Singtel ..
from what I see,dial up users have no problem with PL but have abit of lag
problem here and there[starhub users]


BTw on to a EQ question:
Can a golden efreeti boots be traded for a FBSS or mith 2h?hehe

Regards
Hevan
Servant of Mithaniel Marr
-----Original Message-----
From: Terence Tan <kctan@...>
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, February 01, 2000 8:58 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] 256k Magix + EverQuest = Low Lag ??? Please
comment!


>From: "Terence Tan" <kctan@...>
>
>
>
>What do u think is the problem here? Does the problems lies with
SingTel/SCV or
>it lies with Verant?
>
>
>
>
>
>"Entreri" <drizzt@...> on 27/01/2000 03:20:54 PM
>
>Please respond to sg-everquest@onelist.com
>
>To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
>cc: (bcc: Terence Tan/IHL-HQ/SIN/IHL)
>
>Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] 256k Magix + EverQuest = Low Lag ??? Please
> comment!
>
>
>
>
>From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>
>Cable is prolly slightly better.
>Morning to Evening ping is abt 180-250 with a pl of 0-10% but as it gets
>later,it gets worse however the worst Ive gotten this past few weeks is
>600+ping 30%pl..thats at about 11pm.
>
>The ping starts to get higher after 6pm all the way to the laggiest point
at
>11pm however this does not occur that often.Usually during weekends =)
>
>This is according to the Lans Vytl,Prexus Server
>
>Regards
>Hevan
>Servant of Mithaniel Marr
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Terence Tan <kctan@...>
>To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>Date: Thursday, January 27, 2000 1:24 PM
>Subject: [sg-everquest] 256k Magix + EverQuest = Low Lag ??? Please
comment!
>
>
>>From: "Terence Tan" <kctan@...>
>>
>>
>>
>>Who is using Magix to play EverQuest? Care to share ur experience with us?
>Have
>>any of u experience bad lag?
>>
>>My ping/lag used to be very good until 2 days ago. Since then, everyday I
>went
>>home from work (around 8pm) and log into EQ, my lag meter show constant
60%
>>packet lost for incoming and outgoing data. The strange thing is my ping
is
>VERY
>>good, it's around 200-300 constantly for incoming and outgoing data.
>Because of
>>the huge packet lost, I was not able to enjoy the game. But things started
>to
>>get better at around 10:45pm, my ping remains the same and my packet lost
>drop
>>till less than 10% for incoming and outgoing.
>>
>>What is wrong with Magix? Should I switch to cable? Cable user pls
comment.
>>
>>
>>
